function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffective or impractical solutions for real-world challenges related to disease containment in the built environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of planning and design for pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased public transportation ridership","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of representation of diversity in cultures and lifestyles in the text","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simplification of the text may oversimplify the impact of contagious diseases on different communities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Not acknowledging the historical impact of disease on urban planning","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in urban areas due to high density and travel","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential impact of pandemic diseases on urban planning and design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancies in disease spread based on health and urban space quality levels","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases in an interconnected world.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of information technology on the global city","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Digital domination over physical infrastructure","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imaginary future becoming a representation of the stable condition","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on infectious diseases in architecture and urban design education and practice.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New normal of social distancing and virtual engagement leading to living and working in confined spaces.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 disease","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence on individuals, communities, organizations, and governments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of work and living spaces may increase the risk of disease transmission within the home environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Housing preferences based on social attitudes may lead to choices that increase the risk of isolation and lack of social interaction.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New living and working patterns may lead to inadequate building and infrastructure standards for disease prevention.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to changing spatial patterns and requirements in the post pandemic era.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cognizance of risks associated with engaging with strangers in public spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation of active engagement in public spaces due to social distancing measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Alteration of triadic relationships in urban discourse due to post-pandemic considerations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased spontaneous interactions due to covid-19 social distancing measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on mental health in urban areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in urban settings due to dense population and close proximity.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift in place attachment towards prioritizing qualities related to healthy, hygienic, and healing environments.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise of disaster psychology and emphasis on personal safety and health in urban areas due to detrimental incidents, such as the spread of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of disease within the city’s urban structure due to movement patterns and commuting","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of social distancing measures on urban researchers and the public","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of personal experiences on place attachment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emphasis on walking as a mode of transportation can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases in densely populated residential areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"City planning as a dynamic system involves material and nonmaterial inputs and outputs, potentially impacting the spread of contagious diseases within and beyond the city boundaries.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historical and contemporary discussions of urban mobility and spatial structure may overlook the potential impact of contagious diseases on population movement and city networks.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal settlements and slums being underrepresented in discussions and media reports could lead to higher infection rates and transmission of diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of health and living conditions in informal settlements may hinder the development of relevant intervention strategies.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited spatial understanding and experience may hinder the implementation of effective distancing measures in informal settlements and slums.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact on economies due to travel restrictions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in air pollution and carbon emissions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in public transit use and emphasis on cycling and walking","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflict between densification and social distancing measures in urban planning","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enduring transformation and permanent changes in cities due to covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restricting access to travel and questing for alternatives to public transit","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid means of transportation and expansion of urban sprawl contribute to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Connectivity between urban life and nature as a factor contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Migration from rural to urban areas","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical precedence of urbanization and disease management","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Issues related to urban dynamics from the perspective of urban and human geography, urban design, and planning, and transportation engineering.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New environments accommodating new living/working styles from ethnographical and anthropological perspectives.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
